example.text: the vast shadow government of 15,000 congressional staffers that helps create such legislative atrocities as the 1,376 page , 13-pound reconciliation bill that claimed to be the budget of the United States

example.text: a shadow of the confident hawk who defended Oliver North before national cameras at Iran-Contra hearings two years ago
